Max Muncy hit his 14th home run
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a leadoff homer in the first inning
Will Smith hit a home run in the first inning
Tommy Edman hit a two-run home run in the first inning

Cody Bellinger hit a three-run home run in the fifth inning

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers (87-59) remained five games up on the second-place Arizona Diamondbacks in the National League West

Others: Isaac Paredes hit an RBI single in the top of the first inning
Michael Busch followed with a run-scoring double in the top of the first inning

Bobby Miller gave up six runs on five hits over 4 1/3 innings
